title: AE61032: Introduction To Turbulence - Quick Facts

Course name | INTRODUCTION TO TURBULENCE

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: AE21001 3 - 0 - 0: 3 CreditsNature and origin of turbulence; Reynolds averaging, Boussinesq eddy viscosity hypothesis, Prandtl s mixing length theory and von Karman s similarity hypothesis, vorticity dynamics; Statistical theory of turbulence: isotropic and homogeneous turbulence, scales of turbulence, turbulence modeling: turbulent boundary layers, wakes jets and mixing layers, LES and DNS, experimental methods in turbulence, turbulent flow in pipes.
